item.title: Dockerfile multi-stage build
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: Understanding of Docker multi-stage build: Building an image requires a base image, and subsequent operations will be built based on the base image There is a layered concept in the docker image file. item.title: Dockerfile syntax details
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: FROM Specify the base image used to build the image. FROM must be the first instruction in the non-comment line in the Dockerfile. If there is no specified image locally, it will automatically pull the image from the Docker public library.
